FuncDef: This command defines at which bandwidth rate a multicast channel configured to use an administrative rate starts and stop using that rate as the in-use ingress bandwidth when managing ingress multicast paths. This parameter only applies to channels that are configured to use the admin-bw rate with thebw-activity use-admin-bwcommand (both are configured in the multicast-info-policy associated with the channel context).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the defines the rate at which channels configured to use administrative bandwidths change from dynamic bandwidth management to using the channels configured administrative bandwidth. The parameter is expressed as an integer value and represents multiples of 1,000 bits per second. A value of 3000 indicates 3,000,000 bits per second. Values-1 to 40,000,000.
